channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s big bill and economic policies are sowing chaos. It’s time for investors to send him a message.
item.description: Any investor who thinks the administration’s economic policy is useful or somehow not dangerous is trading in ignorance.

item.title: For Replit’s CEO, the future of software is ‘agents all the way down’
item.description: Replit's agents can help non-developers design and code an app in a mere 15 minutes, illustrating the disruprtion of vibe coding.
